name: Fish out of Water (kieranmcg)
description:
Controls are explained in game

This game is to show the dangers of throwing the wrong things down the toilets for a college project and is supposed to be playable for all ages

Beat the level to unlock facts, they can later be viewed in the facts page

You are a fish that was flushed down the toilet, you have to get used to your new home but first you have to get rid of all the rubbish coming your way and rescue fellow friends

There is a problem that will sometimes occur where it thinks you won twice when you won once, but you can still view the facts in the fact page if it skips over one
